segments.text: Listen , you can not afford another day off . You ’ Ve called in sick five times in the last three weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but I am really sick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I want a note from the doctor this one and to be honest , if it continues , we may not be able to have you here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , sir . I ’ ll bring a doctor ’ s note in tomorrow . I am sorry , Mr . Thomas
segments.speaker: S2
